chapter.text: Cranking the wheel to the left you open the door.^1500 It swings open and hits the wall as you step through.^1500 In front of you is a long hallway with similar doors, evenly spaced out seemingly going for hundreds of feet.^1500 Fluorescent lights flicker along the hallway and provide a soft blue glow.^1500 The door you step out of is at the end of the hallway.
